content: next 5 stitches* repeat from * to * across wavy edge to next corner work 3htr in middle stitch of corner 1htr in each of next 6 stitches 3htr in next corner stitch repeat straight and wavy edges as before round 2 b work another round of half_double_crochet s into back bar along straight and wavy edges working 3htr in peaks and corners and htr2tog in dips round 3 c work half_double_crochet s along the straight edge until first corner 3htr in corner stitch 1htr into each of next 9 stitches 1dc in next stitch 3dc in next stitch 1dc in next stitch *1htr into each of next 2 stitches 1tr into each of next 2 stitches dtr2tog over next 3 stitches miss the middle st 1tr into each of the next 2 stitches 1htr into each of the next 2 stitches 3dc into each of the next 3 stitches * repeat from * to * to next corner work 3dc into first corner stitch 1dc into next stitch 1htr into each of the next 9 stitches 3htr into next stitch repeat straight and wavy edges as before round 4 c work a round of trebles into each stitch and 3 into corner stitches round 5 c work a round of crab stitch ©kaye adolphson 2021
